cat_item.display_value: Copy of Request\Revoke GAF\Other Share Access

catalog_script_client.name: GAF Share access selection validation

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_efa5eaffdb783458effc34523996196c
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><cat_item display_value="Copy of Request\Revoke GAF\Other Share Access">cba5eebfdb783458effc34523996193c</cat_item><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>GAF Share access selection validation</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onSubmit() {
   //Type appropriate comment here, and begin script below
	
	var readaccess = g_form.getValue('Read_Only_Access');
	var readwrite = g_form.getValue('Read_Write_Access');
	var revokewrite = g_form.getValue('people_that_revoke_write_access');
	var revokereadwrite = g_form.getValue('people_to_revoke_read_write_access');
	
	if(readaccess==''&& readwrite =='' && revokewrite=='' && revokereadwrite=='')
		{
			//alert('Please select anyone of the following fields to whom access should be given or to be revoked');
			confirm('Please select anyone of the following fields to whom access should be given or to be revoked');
			g_form.showFieldMsg('Read_Only_Access','Please choose the user who needs read access','error');
			g_form.showFieldMsg('Read_Write_Access','Please choose the user who needs read/write access','error');
			g_form.showFieldMsg('people_that_revoke_write_access','Please choose the user whose write access should be revoked','error');
			g_form.showFieldMsg('people_to_revoke_read_write_access','Please choose the user whose read/write access should be revoked','error');
			return false;
			
		}
	
   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>nxf52093</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-06-24 10:00:05</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>efa5eaffdb783458effc34523996196c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GAF Share access selection validation</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NXP GAF Share Automation" source="x_nxps3_nxp_gaf_sh">4a417d661b85005017daa6886e4bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="NXP GAF Share Automation">4a417d661b85005017daa6886e4bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_efa5eaffdb783458effc34523996196c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>nxf52093</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-06-24 10:00:05</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onSubmit</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
